item.label: Version 0.1
item.description: The current release on the development server.

item.label: Version 0.3
item.description: An early alpha release for internal testing. This will be feature complete for 1.0. Target - 3 months after funding.

item.label: Beta 1 Version 0.5
item.description: An beta release for customers with a special arrangement with the organization. Target - 6 months after funding.

item.label: Version 1.0
item.description: The first general release for general customer availability. Target - 9 months after funding.

item.label: Version 2.0
item.description: The second general release for customers. Target target 19 months after funding.

item.label: Future
item.description: A release somewhere in the 10 year time span. All really advanced "would love to have" features go here.

item.label: Test
item.description: A release somewhere in the 10 year time span. All really advanced "would love to have" features go here.
